articles.title: Messi arrives in Argentina for World Cup Qualifiers against Uruguay and Brazil
articles.description: Read more about Messi arrives in Argentina for World Cup Qualifiers against Uruguay and Brazil on Devdiscourse
articles.content:
Lionel Messi arrived in Argentina this Monday morning to attend the double round of South American World Cup Qualifiers this month.
He landed in a private jet together with his Paris Saint-Germain teammates Angel di Maria and Leandro Paredes.

articles.title: Argentine exporters vow safeguards to keep GM wheat out of shipments

articles.title: In a world desperate for wheat, Australia and Argentina step up
articles.description: Australia is set to ship 24.5 million tons in the coming season, says Rabobank, or near to the highest quantity ever.
articles.content:
For the second season in a row, the stars are favourably aligned for Australian wheat growers – a bumper harvest, a shortage of one of the world’s most important foods and global prices near nine-year highs.

articles.title: Drier weather returns to Argentina
articles.description: After receiving some much-needed rainfall to kick off November, Argentina’s major soybean producing regions will turn drier.
articles.content: Brazil continues to be in a favorable position as soybean planting advances well above the five-year average and last year. The timely planting of soybeans is important as it allows the safrinha crop, or second-corn crop, to be planted and reach crit... [1993 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-Milan and Inter share spoils in derby thriller
articles.description: Inter’s lead lasted only six minutes before De Vrij headed a dangerous cross into his own net, but the Nerazzurri had a golden chance to regain the advantage when Fode Ballo-Toure brought down Matteo Darmian to concede a second spot kick. This time Martinez stepped up, but the Argentina international’s effort was saved by Tatarusanu, who sprung to his right to get a hand to the shot.
articles.content:
AC Milan continued their unbeaten start to the Serie A season with a 1-1 draw against Inter Milan in an enthralling Milan Derby on Sunday, maintaining the Rossoneri's seven-point lead over the reigning Italian champions.

articles.title: Rugby-Flament and Mauvaka tries give France tight win over Argentina
articles.description: Argentina showed terrific spirit to launch a series of attacks in the last 10 minutes and closed the gap with a Mateo Carreras try but France had the last word with Jaminet's fifth penalty. "The balance is positive but we struggled to keep the ball and they made it tough in the first half," said captain Antoine Dupont.
articles.content: Second-half tries by debutant lock Thibaud Flament and hooker Peato Mauvaka and superb goalkicking by Melvyn Jaminet helped France to a 29-20 victory over a battling Argentina in a typically intense clash in the Stade de France on Saturday. Flament w... [3170 chars]

articles.title: France Edges Argentina 29-20 In Back-and-forth Thriller
articles.description: Lock Thibaud Flament scored a try on his test debut and hooker Peato Mauvaka came off the bench to make the game safe with his first at international level as France beat a muchchanged Argentina 2920 on Saturday.
articles.content:
PARIS: Lock Thibaud Flament scored a try on his test debut and hooker Peato Mauvaka came off the bench to make the game safe with his first at international level as France beat a much-changed Argentina 29-20 on Saturday.
